levels.levelDescription: Welcome to the Enchanted Grove, a mystical forest where ancient trees whisper secrets of old. The dark-grass path winds through the grove, but beware of the deep-dark-holes that lie hidden beneath the foliage, ready to ensnare the unwary traveler.

Ascend to the Frosty Summit, where the icy winds howl and snow blankets the towering peaks. The crunch of snow underfoot guides your way, but beware of frozen waters that threaten to chill you to the bone, obstructing your path to the peak.

Enter the Shadowed Citadel, a foreboding fortress draped in darkness and decay. Rusty-chain-platforms creak under your weight as you navigate the treacherous depths, but the real danger lies in the rivers of flowing lava that flow through the heart of the citadel, a testament to the malevolent sorcerer Malum's dark power.
